definition: to be adept in/to excel at
to go/to take/sentence-final interrogative particle/variant of 於|于[yu2]

sentences.english: Investigation was carried out for water penetration into moso bamboo (Phyllostachys pubescens), grown in Fuyang, Zhejiang Province.
sentences.chinese: 研究生长于浙江省富阳的毛竹的水分浸入特性。

sentences.english: Dictionaries are still good for obscure usages and etymologies.
sentences.chinese: 字典依然擅长于不常用的用法和词源。

sentences.english: English is learned rather than taught.
sentences.chinese: 英语是学长于教的语言。

sentences.english: Helen is very good at throwing the javelin and Mary is very good at running.
sentences.chinese: 海伦很擅长标枪，玛丽则长于跑步。

sentences.english: Source Galbanum is an umbelliferous plant that grows in Iran and Afghanistan.
sentences.chinese: 白松香是伞形科植物，长于伊朗和阿富汗。

sentences.english: YiLin is used for divination and the author is good at saying calamity and abnormal phenomena.
sentences.chinese: 《易林》原为占筮之作，其作者本长于灾变之说。

sentences.english: was born in Elmira, New York and did most of his growing up in central Pennsylvania.
sentences.chinese: 凯文出生于纽约州的艾尔迈拉，长于宾夕法尼亚。

sentences.english: He’s a craftsman whose specialties include hand-made bullets and silencers.
sentences.chinese: 他是一位手工艺者，长于土制子弹和消音器。

sentences.english: It has long wings and so it is good at flying over the sea.
sentences.chinese: 它有一双长翅膀所以它擅长于越过海洋。

sentences.english: Text is good at expressing what is done in a single step of in a business process.
sentences.chinese: 文本长于表述在业务流程的单个步骤中完成的工作。

sentences.english: It also excels at quick development of simple applications.
sentences.chinese: 它还擅长于快速开发简单的应用程序。

sentences.english: Ask an elderly friend or family member to tell you a story about their childhood.
sentences.chinese: 请年长于你的朋友或家人告诉你关于他们的童年趣事。

sentences.english: Are you good at staying 2)calm in life-or-death 3)situations?
sentences.chinese: 在生死攸关时，你是否擅长于保持镇定？

sentences.english: She was short on intellect, but long on shape.
sentences.chinese: 她短于理智而长于恣态。

sentences.english: Just as importantly, our brains are really good at feeling what others are feeling.
sentences.chinese: 我们的大脑非常擅长于去感受别人正在感受的事物。

sentences.english: The good works of flowers and birds painted flowers and birds in the natural environment, wild look.
sentences.chinese: 其花鸟作品长于在天然情况中描绘花鸟的神情野趣。

definition: without authority/to usurp/to arrogate to oneself/to monopolize/expert in/to be good at
to be good at/to be adept at
to be good at sth/one's forte
not stick to/not confine oneself to/whatever
to make reference to/to write about
such matters/things like this/this line of work/this pursuit/this hobby/this endeavor
to be proficient in/to master (a subject)
proficient (in sth)/to understand sth through and through
